name: ts-rest-api-playground-server
description: CRUD RESTful API built with TypeScript + Node.js + Postgresql + Docker
author: Alexandre Gimenez (algife.com)

scripts.XXXprestart: npm run clean && npm run build:docker-img
scripts.XXXbuild: echo 'Building App...' && npm run docker:compile && npm run docker:copy-files && echo 'Project built'
scripts.XXXbuild:docker-img: docker build . -t ts-rest-api-playground-server-image && echo 'Docker Image built'
scripts.XXXbuild:ssl: cd ./config/sslcert && npx mkcert -cert-file app.cert -key-file app.key yourdomain.com *.yourdomain.com localhost ::1 0.0.0.0 127.0.0.1 && echo 'SSL Certificate created'
scripts.XXXcleanOLD: npm run docker:clean && npx rimraf -rf ./dist && echo 'Project cleaned'
scripts.XXXdeploy: echo 'Deploying Serverless App...' && npm run sls:deploy && echo 'Serverless App deployed!'
scripts.XXXdocker:restart: npm run docker:down && npm run docker:up
scripts.XXXdocker:copy-files: npx copyfiles -a -u 1 public/**.** config/sslcert/**.** dist/ && echo 'Files copied to the dist folder'
scripts.XXXdocker:clean: npm run docker:down && docker rm ts-rest-api-playground-server -f && docker image rm ts-rest-api-playground-server-image:latest -f && docker volume rm api-database-vol -f
scripts.XXXdocker:logs: docker logs ts-rest-api-playground-server && docker logs ts-rest-api-playground-database-server
